title: Family Troubles
description: Canada’s favorite family is having a great day, eh!
quote: Poutine? That’s not what I ordered!
starring: Tom Hortins, Barbara Jones, Victoria Taylor, Grizz
altHero: a family sitting on the couch watching tv, one member is a little bear

alt2: a mom with a big bowl of poutine
